page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CHERYL
page.content: I get up at 7.30am,have my breakfast and set off for school.I have to be at school for 8.30am because I am an {animal monitor.}I come to school and feed all the animals which include,{rats,mice,rabbits and {budgies.}After registration I do{maths then{language.}In the afternoon I do {topic work}or{games.}When I get home from school I have my tea then I either do my{homework}or I{play outside. I come in at 6.30pm to get ready for {swimming club.}When I come home from swimming club I sometimes play{tennis with my friends.I also go{dancing}with my friends on a Monday night.It is held at school.We do{folk dancing}and we go to lots of different places doing{displays.
